001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.text.MessageFormat;
004import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
005
006import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.CaseChanging;
009
010/**
011 * Formats a LogEvent message.
012 *
013 * @apiNote This is sealed at the moment and maybe unsealed in the future so exhaustive
014 * pattern matching should not be done.
015 */
016@CaseChanging
017public sealed interface LogMessageFormatter {
018
019        /**
020         * Formats and appends the results.
021         * @param builder output.
022         * @param message message usually with formatting delimiters for replacement.
023         * @param arg1 to use for replacement.
024         */
025        void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1);
026
027        /**
028         * Formats and appends the results.
029         * @param builder output.
030         * @param message message usually with formatting delimiters for replacement.
031         * @param arg1 to use for replacement.
032         * @param arg2 to use for replacement.
033         */
034        void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2);
035
036        /**
037         * Formats and appends the result.
038         * @param builder output.
039         * @param message message usually with formatting delimiters for replacement.
040         * @param args array of args.
041         */
042        void formatArray(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object[] args);
043
044        /**
045         * Built-in message formatters.
046         */
047        @CaseChanging
048        public enum StandardMessageFormatter implements LogMessageFormatter {
049
050                /**
051                 * SLF4J format style where "<code>{}</code>" is replaced with the parameters. The
052                 * implementation largely comes from the SLF4J but optimized for StringBuilder.
053                 */
054                SLF4J() {
055                        @Override
056                        public void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1) {
057                                SLF4JMessageFormatter.format(builder, message, arg1);
058                        }
059
060                        @Override
061                        public void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2) {
062                                SLF4JMessageFormatter.format(builder, message, arg1, arg2);
063                        }
064
065                        @Override
066                        public void formatArray(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object[] args) {
067                                SLF4JMessageFormatter.format(builder, message, args);
068                        }
069                },
070                /**
071                 * java.util.logging MessageFormat style.
072                 */
073                JUL() {
074
075                        @Override
076                        public void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1) {
077                                try {
078                                        String result = MessageFormat.format(message, arg1);
079                                        builder.append(result);
080                                }
081                                catch (RuntimeException e) {
082                                        formatBadPattern(builder, message, e);
083                                }
084                        }
085
086                        private static void formatBadPattern(StringBuilder builder, String message, RuntimeException e) {
087                                builder.append(message)
088                                        .append(" ")
089                                        .append("[MessageFormat failed: ")
090                                        .append(e.getMessage())
091                                        .append("]");
092                        }
093
094                        @Override
095                        public void format(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2) {
096                                try {
097                                        String result = MessageFormat.format(message, arg1, arg2);
098                                        builder.append(result);
099                                }
100                                catch (RuntimeException e) {
101                                        formatBadPattern(builder, message, e);
102                                }
103
104                        }
105
106                        @Override
107                        public void formatArray(StringBuilder builder, String message, @Nullable Object[] args) {
108                                try {
109                                        String result = MessageFormat.format(message, args);
110                                        builder.append(result);
111                                }
112                                catch (RuntimeException e) {
113                                        formatBadPattern(builder, message, e);
114                                }
115                        }
116
117                }
118
119        }
120
121}
122
123final class SLF4JMessageFormatter {
124
125        private static final char DELIM_START = '{';
126
127        // private static final char DELIM_STOP = '}';
128        private static final String DELIM_STR = "{}";
129
130        private static final char ESCAPE_CHAR = '\\';
131
132        private SLF4JMessageFormatter() {
133        }
134
135        public static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, final @Nullable String messagePattern,
136                        final @Nullable Object arg1) {
137                format(sbuf, messagePattern, arg1, null, null, 1);
138        }
139
140        public static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, final @Nullable String messagePattern,
141                        final @Nullable Object arg1, final @Nullable Object arg2) {
142                format(sbuf, messagePattern, arg1, arg2, null, 2);
143        }
144
145        public static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, final @Nullable String messagePattern,
146                        final @Nullable Object @Nullable [] args) {
147                if (args == null || args.length == 0) {
148                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, null, null, null, 0);
149                        return;
150                }
151                else if (args.length == 1) {
152                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, args[0], null, null, 1);
153                        return;
154                }
155                else if (args.length == 2) {
156                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, args[0], args[1], null, 2);
157                        return;
158                }
159                else {
160                        format(sbuf, messagePattern, null, null, args, args.length);
161                }
162        }
163
164        private static void format(final StringBuilder sbuf, //
165                        final @Nullable String messagePattern, //
166                        final @Nullable Object arg1, //
167                        final @Nullable Object arg2, //
168                        final @Nullable Object @Nullable [] args, //
169                        final int argCount) {
170
171                if (messagePattern == null) {
172                        return;
173                }
174
175                if (argCount == 0) {
176                        sbuf.append(messagePattern);
177                        return;
178                }
179
180                int i = 0;
181                int j;
182                int L;
183                for (L = 0; L < argCount; L++) {
184
185                        j = messagePattern.indexOf(DELIM_STR, i);
186
187                        if (j == -1) {
188                                // no more variables
189                                if (i == 0) { // this is a simple string
190                                        sbuf.append(messagePattern);
191                                        return;
192                                }
193                                else { // add the tail string which contains no variables and return
194                                                // the result.
195                                        sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, messagePattern.length());
196                                        return;
197                                }
198                        }
199                        else {
200                                if (isEscapedDelimeter(messagePattern, j)) {
201                                        if (!isDoubleEscaped(messagePattern, j)) {
202                                                L--; // DELIM_START was escaped, thus should not be incremented
203                                                sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, j - 1);
204                                                sbuf.append(DELIM_START);
205                                                i = j + 1;
206                                        }
207                                        else {
208                                                // The escape character preceding the delimiter start is
209                                                // itself escaped: "abc x:\\{}"
210                                                // we have to consume one backward slash
211                                                sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, j - 1);
212                                                Object arg = resolveArg(L, arg1, arg2, args, argCount);
213                                                deeplyAppendParameter(sbuf, arg, null);
214                                                i = j + 2;
215                                        }
216                                }
217                                else {
218                                        // normal case
219                                        sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, j);
220                                        Object arg = resolveArg(L, arg1, arg2, args, argCount);
221                                        deeplyAppendParameter(sbuf, arg, null);
222                                        i = j + 2;
223                                }
224                        }
225                }
226                // append the characters following the last {} pair.
227                sbuf.append(messagePattern, i, messagePattern.length());
228        }
229
230        private static @Nullable Object resolveArg(int i, @Nullable Object arg1, @Nullable Object arg2,
231                        @Nullable Object @Nullable [] args, int argCount) {
232                if (i >= argCount || argCount == 0) {
233                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(i);
234                }
235                if (argCount > 2) {
236                        if (args == null) {
237                                throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(i);
238                        }
239                        return args[i];
240                }
241                else if (i == 0) {
242                        return arg1;
243                }
244                else if (i == 1) {
245                        return arg2;
246                }
247                throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(i);
248        }
249
250        final static boolean isEscapedDelimeter(String messagePattern, int delimeterStartIndex) {
251
252                if (delimeterStartIndex == 0) {
253                        return false;
254                }
255                char potentialEscape = messagePattern.charAt(delimeterStartIndex - 1);
256                if (potentialEscape == ESCAPE_CHAR) {
257                        return true;
258                }
259                else {
260                        return false;
261                }
262        }
263
264        final static boolean isDoubleEscaped(String messagePattern, int delimeterStartIndex) {
265                if (delimeterStartIndex >= 2 && messagePattern.charAt(delimeterStartIndex - 2) == ESCAPE_CHAR) {
266                        return true;
267                }
268                else {
269                        return false;
270                }
271        }
272
273        /*
274         * The below is adapted code from SLF4J
275         */
276        // special treatment of array values was suggested by 'lizongbo'
277        private static void deeplyAppendParameter(StringBuilder sbuf, @Nullable Object o,
278                        @Nullable IdentityHashMap<@Nullable Object[], @Nullable Object> seenMap) {
279                if (o == null) {
280                        sbuf.append("null");
281                        return;
282                }
283                if (!o.getClass().isArray()) {
284                        safeObjectAppend(sbuf, o);
285                }
286                else {
287                        // check for primitive array types because they
288                        // unfortunately cannot be cast to Object[]
289                        if (o instanceof boolean[]) {
290                                booleanArrayAppend(sbuf, (boolean[]) o);
291                        }
292                        else if (o instanceof byte[]) {
293                                byteArrayAppend(sbuf, (byte[]) o);
294                        }
295                        else if (o instanceof char[]) {
296                                charArrayAppend(sbuf, (char[]) o);
297                        }
298                        else if (o instanceof short[]) {
299                                shortArrayAppend(sbuf, (short[]) o);
300                        }
301                        else if (o instanceof int[]) {
302                                intArrayAppend(sbuf, (int[]) o);
303                        }
304                        else if (o instanceof long[]) {
305                                longArrayAppend(sbuf, (long[]) o);
306                        }
307                        else if (o instanceof float[]) {
308                                floatArrayAppend(sbuf, (float[]) o);
309                        }
310                        else if (o instanceof double[]) {
311                                doubleArrayAppend(sbuf, (double[]) o);
312                        }
313                        else {
314                                if (seenMap == null) {
315                                        seenMap = new IdentityHashMap<>();
316                                }
317                                objectArrayAppend(sbuf, (@Nullable Object[]) o, seenMap);
318                        }
319                }
320        }
321
322        private static void safeObjectAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, Object o) {
323                try {
324                        String oAsString = o.toString();
325                        sbuf.append(oAsString);
326                }
327                catch (Throwable t) {
328                        // Util.report("SLF4J: Failed toString() invocation on an object of type [" +
329                        // o.getClass().getName() + "]", t);
330                        sbuf.append("[FAILED toString()]");
331                }
332
333        }
334
335        private static void objectArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, @Nullable Object[] a,
336                        IdentityHashMap<@Nullable Object[], @Nullable Object> seenMap) {
337                sbuf.append('[');
338                if (!seenMap.containsKey(a)) {
339                        seenMap.put(a, null);
340                        final int len = a.length;
341                        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
342                                deeplyAppendParameter(sbuf, a[i], seenMap);
343                                if (i != len - 1)
344                                        sbuf.append(", ");
345                        }
346                        // allow repeats in siblings
347                        seenMap.remove(a);
348                }
349                else {
350                        sbuf.append("...");
351                }
352                sbuf.append(']');
353        }
354
355        private static void booleanArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, boolean[] a) {
356                sbuf.append('[');
357                final int len = a.length;
358                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
359                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
360                        if (i != len - 1)
361                                sbuf.append(", ");
362                }
363                sbuf.append(']');
364        }
365
366        private static void byteArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, byte[] a) {
367                sbuf.append('[');
368                final int len = a.length;
369                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
370                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
371                        if (i != len - 1)
372                                sbuf.append(", ");
373                }
374                sbuf.append(']');
375        }
376
377        private static void charArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, char[] a) {
378                sbuf.append('[');
379                final int len = a.length;
380                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
381                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
382                        if (i != len - 1)
383                                sbuf.append(", ");
384                }
385                sbuf.append(']');
386        }
387
388        private static void shortArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, short[] a) {
389                sbuf.append('[');
390                final int len = a.length;
391                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
392                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
393                        if (i != len - 1)
394                                sbuf.append(", ");
395                }
396                sbuf.append(']');
397        }
398
399        private static void intArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, int[] a) {
400                sbuf.append('[');
401                final int len = a.length;
402                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
403                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
404                        if (i != len - 1)
405                                sbuf.append(", ");
406                }
407                sbuf.append(']');
408        }
409
410        private static void longArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, long[] a) {
411                sbuf.append('[');
412                final int len = a.length;
413                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
414                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
415                        if (i != len - 1)
416                                sbuf.append(", ");
417                }
418                sbuf.append(']');
419        }
420
421        private static void floatArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, float[] a) {
422                sbuf.append('[');
423                final int len = a.length;
424                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
425                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
426                        if (i != len - 1)
427                                sbuf.append(", ");
428                }
429                sbuf.append(']');
430        }
431
432        private static void doubleArrayAppend(StringBuilder sbuf, double[] a) {
433                sbuf.append('[');
434                final int len = a.length;
435                for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
436                        sbuf.append(a[i]);
437                        if (i != len - 1)
438                                sbuf.append(", ");
439                }
440                sbuf.append(']');
441        }
442
443}
